h1. How to access and enable IDE

Before working with eXo IDE gadget, make sure that you are logged in portal. 
Then, select *"Group->Developers Page->IDE"* in top menu (see pic. 1) to open eXo IDE gadget.

!eXo_IDE_gadget_in_platform.png!

*Picture 1. Access eXo IDE gadget in eXo Platform 3.0*

h1. Requirements

Supported Web browsers:
* Mozilla Firefox 3.0+ 
* Internet Explorer7.0+
* Safari 3.2+
* Google Chrome 5.0+
